text: Karaobaka yadi tara beya karma sobhaniya karai dekhuraa haya phalata si se'itoka uttama buli bharae, (se'ijana byakti te'omra darae haâ€™ba paraene yiye bhala kamaka bhala arau beya kamaka beya buli bharae?) Eteke niscaya allahe yaka iccha bibhraanta karae arau yaka iccha take hidayata diye. Eteke sihamtara babe aksepa karai tumi nijara praana binasa nakaraiba. Sihamte yi karae niscaya allaha se'i samparke samyaka paraijnata
